text: Jason Morgan Ritter (born February 17, 1980) is an American actor. He received an Emmy Award nomination for his role in Parenthood. Ritter's mother is Nancy Morgan. His father was John Ritter. Ritter first appeared in the opening credits of his father's show, Three's Company. ==Filmography== * Joan of Arcadia - Kevin Girardi * The Event - Sean Walker * Gravity Falls - voice of Dipper Pines * Parenthood - Mark Cyr ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Jason Ritter
